name: Mapland Afflicted Survival
description:
As said, map is randomly generated and landmarks placed about everywhere. You might even be unlucky and be stuck on a tiny island. Even if necrotic energy drops to zero you can still explore.

Controls are simple :

  • AWSD to move around.
  • E to feed in Desecrated Tombs.

UPDATE Aug 23rd 2020 : You can now play whatever little I've managed to do in very little time that was given for this GameJam.

Credits 

  • Every sprite, UI, and fonts assets - GameJam restriction was to only use assets from Kenney, but I've mainly used the Cartography pack and UI Pack RPG Expansion. (FREE)
